content: **christmas elf ornament crochet pattern** this crochet elf ornament pattern lets you create a charming mini amigurumi elf perfect as a christmas tree decoration holiday wreath accent cheerful hanging ornament or festive plushie for gifting available as an instant pdf download the crochet pattern is 6 pages long and written in english and us crochet terms the pattern contains plenty of progress photos to guide you along and is an easy skill level project **supplies** 3mm & 4mm crochet hook dk weight yarn scissors sewing needle 5mm safety eyes toy stuffing black embroidery thread **yarn** weight dk / light worsted/ #3 brand stylecraft squeeze me dk a champagne b pink c green d red total 49 yards **gauge** 3mm hook 2″ x 2″ swatch = 10 row of 10 single_crochet 4mm hook 2″ x 2″ swatch = 4 row of 7 double_crochet **finished size** width 8cm x height 13cm **abbreviations us terms ** chain chain double_crochet double_crochet 2dc 2 double_crochet in 1 space increase decrease double_crochet 2 together decrease magic_ring magic_ring r round / row single_crochet single_crochet 2sc 2 single_crochet in 1 space increase decrease single_crochet 2 together decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch st/sts stitch/stitches **skill level** easy **notes** a free online basic version of this crochet pattern is available at https //hookfully com/free-crochet-elf-ornament-pattern/
